Class SpaceShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceShip

  • public class SpaceShip
extends java.lang.Object
    The spaceship object that is used in the SpaceWars game.
    Author:
    oop

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void collidedWithAnotherShip()
      This method is called every time a collision with this ship occurs
      void doAction(SpaceWars game)
      Does the actions of this ship for this round.
      void fire(SpaceWars game)
      Attempts to fire a shot.
      java.awt.Image getImage()
      Gets the image of this ship.
      oop.ex2.SpaceShipPhysics getPhysics()
      Gets the physics object that controls this ship.
      void gotHit()
      This method is called by the SpaceWars game object when ever this ship gets hit by a shot.
      boolean isDead()
      Checks if this ship is dead.
      void reset()
      This method is called whenever a ship has died.
      void shieldOn()
      Attempts to turn on the shield.
      void teleport()
      Attempts to teleport.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • doAction

        public void doAction(SpaceWars game)
        Does the actions of this ship for this round. This is called once per round by the SpaceWars game driver.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object to which this ship belongs.

      • collidedWithAnotherShip

        public void collidedWithAnotherShip()
        This method is called every time a collision with this ship occurs

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method is called whenever a ship has died. It resets the ship's attributes, and starts it at a new random position.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Checks if this ship is dead.
        Returns:
        true if the ship is dead. false otherwise.

      • getPhysics

        public oop.ex2.SpaceShipPhysics getPhysics()
        Gets the physics object that controls this ship.
        Returns:
        the physics object that controls the ship.

      • gotHit

        public void gotHit()
        This method is called by the SpaceWars game object when ever this ship gets hit by a shot.

      • getImage

        public java.awt.Image getImage()
        Gets the image of this ship. This method should return the image of the ship with or without the shield. This will be displayed on the GUI at the end of the round.
        Returns:
        the image of this ship.

      • fire

        public void fire(SpaceWars game)
        Attempts to fire a shot.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object.

      • shieldOn

        public void shieldOn()
        Attempts to turn on the shield.

      • teleport

        public void teleport()
        Attempts to teleport.
